body: The writing in this is just too good. I loved D-Medal and this is a flawless side-story. This girl always seemed oddly suspicious. She came out of nowhere and was never seen again so it makes perfect sense that she'd be in this situation too. Honestly, this author could write stories without the H element and I'd probably read or possibly even pay for them

so they will make a new series?
too bad, even the previous series only contains netorare and cheating.
Of course it didn't have any of my blacklisted tags even though it needed them
Finished reading, and only then did I read the t/n note on the 1st page. Guess i gotta read prequel now
